member.name: M:Eco.ModKit.RoslynCompiler.GetTypes
member.summary: Get all class types that are not compiler generated.

summary.p: Returns all source files from `__core__` directory and files from `UserCode` directory. If `UserCode` contains file with same path as in `__core__` directory, but with .override suffix in name (before .cs) then it will replace file from `__core__`.
Otherwise both files will be loaded and file from UserCode should extend existing class with partial methods or add new class.
